frames.caption: A regal figure stands triumphantly on a majestic lion, surrounded by a fiery backdrop. The person wears a crown and an ornate red robe, extending their arms outward in a commanding gesture. A crowd watches in awe, adding to the dramatic atmosphere.
frames.description: The scene depicts a powerful and theatrical moment, likely set in a grand ceremonial or fantasy setting. The central figure exudes authority and confidence, while the lion adds an element of strength and majesty.

frames.caption: A regal figure stands confidently with arms outstretched, adorned in a richly decorated red robe and a golden crown. In front of him, a majestic lion with a fiery mane exudes power and strength. The background is ablaze with dramatic flames, creating a scene of grandeur and intensity.
frames.description: The scene depicts a powerful and dramatic setting, possibly representing a fantasy or mythical realm. The central figure, dressed in royal attire, stands before a backdrop of roaring flames, suggesting themes of power, authority, and dominance. The presence of the lion enhances the majestic and commanding atmosphere.

summary: People: crowd, regal figure, king. Animals: lion. Nature: fire. Objects: crown, robe. Actions: standing, gesturing, arms outstretched. Emotions: awe, triumph, confidence, power. Scenes: fantasy, ceremony, mythical. Concepts: power, majesty, royalty, strength
